name: LONELY APE
description: Biosemiotics #3. A visual exploration of interspecies communication, non-human language and transspecific syntax. Graphics based on plant and animal frottage. Animated to reimagine the syntactic and axiological hierarchies between human, animal and plant. By Olof Petterss0n (@olof_pettersson). Read more about the project at olofpettersson.se/biosemiotics.
